00590 #define EXPR_IS_MEASURABLE(x)      (((SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_STATIC) && \
00591                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_LAST) && \
00592                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_LIST) && \
00593                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_COND_SEL) && \
00594                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASE) && \
00595                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASEX) && \
00596                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASEZ) && \
00597                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_DEFAULT) && \
00598                                      !((SUPPL_IS_ROOT( x->suppl ) == 0) && \
00599                                        ((SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_SIG) || \
00600                                         (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_SBIT_SEL) || \
00601                                         (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_MBIT_SEL)) && \
00602                                        (SUPPL_OP( x->parent->expr->suppl ) != EXP_OP_COND)) && \
00603                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_DELAY)) ? 1 : 0)
00604 
00609 #define EXPR_EVAL_STATIC(x)      (((((x->left != NULL) && (SUPPL_OP( x->left->suppl ) == EXP_OP_STATIC))            || \
00610                                     ((x->left != NULL) && (SUPPL_WAS_EXECUTED( x->left->suppl ) == 1))  || \
00611                                     (x->left == NULL))                                                                && \
00612                                    (((x->right != NULL) && (SUPPL_OP( x->right->suppl ) == EXP_OP_STATIC))          || \
00613                                     ((x->right != NULL) && (SUPPL_WAS_EXECUTED( x->right->suppl ) == 1)) || \
00614                                     (x->right == NULL))                                                               && \
00615                                    (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_COND_SEL)   && \
00616                                    (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_SBIT_SEL)   && \
00617                                    (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_MBIT_SEL)   && \
00618                                    (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_PARAM)      && \
00619                                    (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_PARAM_SBIT) && \
00620                                    (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_PARAM_MBIT) && \
00621                                    (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_STATIC)     && \
00622                                    (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_SIG)        && \
00623                                    (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_LAST)       && \
00624                                    (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_DEFAULT)    && \
00625                                    (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_DELAY)) ? 1 : 0)
00626 
00631 #define EXPR_COMB_MISSED(x)        (EXPR_IS_MEASURABLE( x ) & \
00632                                     ~EXPR_EVAL_STATIC( x ) & \
00633                                     (~SUPPL_WAS_TRUE( x->suppl ) | ~SUPPL_WAS_FALSE( x->suppl )))

01078  $Log$
01079  Revision 1.55  2002/10/31 23:13:36  phase1geo
01080  Fixing C compatibility problems with cc and gcc.  Found a few possible problems
01081  with 64-bit vs. 32-bit compilation of the tool.  Fixed bug in parser that
01082  lead to bus errors.  Ran full regression in 64-bit mode without error.
01083 
01084  Revision 1.54  2002/10/29 19:57:50  phase1geo
01085  Fixing problems with beginning block comments within comments which are
01086  produced automatically by CVS.  Should fix warning messages from compiler.
01087 
01088  Revision 1.53  2002/10/25 13:43:49  phase1geo
01089  Adding statement iterators for moving in both directions in a list with a single
01090  pointer (two-way).  This allows us to reverse statement lists without additional
01091  memory and time (very efficient).  Full regression passes and TODO list items
01092  2 and 3 are completed.
01093 
01094  Revision 1.52  2002/10/24 05:48:58  phase1geo
01095  Additional fixes for MBIT_SEL.  Changed some philosophical stuff around for
01096  cleaner code and for correctness.  Added some development documentation for
01097  expressions and vectors.  At this point, there is a bug in the way that
01098  parameters are handled as far as scoring purposes are concerned but we no
01099  longer segfault.
01100 
01101  Revision 1.51  2002/10/23 03:39:06  phase1geo
01102  Fixing bug in MBIT_SEL expressions to calculate the expression widths
01103  correctly.  Updated diagnostic testsuite and added diagnostic that
01104  found the original bug.  A few documentation updates.
01105 
01106  Revision 1.50  2002/10/13 19:20:42  phase1geo
01107  Added -T option to score command for properly handling min:typ:max delay expressions.
01108  Updated documentation for -i and -T options to score command and added additional
01109  diagnostic to test instance handling.
01110 
01111  Revision 1.49  2002/10/11 05:23:21  phase1geo
01112  Removing local user message allocation and replacing with global to help
01113  with memory efficiency.
01114 
01115  Revision 1.48  2002/10/11 04:24:01  phase1geo
01116  This checkin represents some major code renovation in the score command to
01117  fully accommodate parameter support.  All parameter support is in at this
01118  point and the most commonly used parameter usages have been verified.  Some
01119  bugs were fixed in handling default values of constants and expression tree
01120  resizing has been optimized to its fullest.  Full regression has been
01121  updated and passes.  Adding new diagnostics to test suite.  Fixed a few
01122  problems in report outputting.
01123 
01124  Revision 1.47  2002/09/26 22:58:46  phase1geo
01125  Fixing syntax error.
01126 
01127  Revision 1.46  2002/09/25 02:51:44  phase1geo
01128  Removing need of vector nibble array allocation and deallocation during
01129  expression resizing for efficiency and bug reduction.  Other enhancements
01130  for parameter support.  Parameter stuff still not quite complete.
01131 
01132  Revision 1.45  2002/09/21 07:03:28  phase1geo

01134  parser to correctly add override parameters.  Once this is complete, phase 3
01135  can start and will include regenerating expressions and signals before
01136  getting output to CDD file.
01137 
01138  Revision 1.44  2002/09/21 04:11:32  phase1geo
01139  Completed phase 1 for adding in parameter support.  Main code is written
01140  that will create an instance parameter from a given module parameter in
01141  its entirety.  The next step will be to complete the module parameter
01142  creation code all the way to the parser.  Regression still passes and
01143  everything compiles at this point.
